docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Everything you need to know to get started with AvangCLI tools.

hero.title: Create your
hero.description: AvangCLI generates pre-configured full-stack projects with Next.js. Deploy in seconds with integrated Docker and CI/CD.

features.title: Power up your
features.description: Everything you need to scale your full-stack applications from day one, automated and standardized.

robustStack.title: Robust Stack
robustStack.description: Docker, Linter, Hooks and more ready to use.

architecture.title: Clear Architecture
architecture.description: Modular structure that scales with your project. Folders organized by features, not by file types.

scaffolding.title: Intelligent
scaffolding.description: Automatically generates the complete module structure for Next.js. Keep your code organized, predictable and scalable from the first commit.

item1.title: Modular Structure
item1.description: Forget about 'spaghetti code'. Each functionality lives in its own isolated module, encapsulating its logic, UI, state and types.

item2.title: Boilerplate Files
item2.description: Base files are automatically generated. Don't waste time copying and pasting empty folder structures.

item3.title: Barrel Exports
item3.description: Automatic configuration of index.ts to keep your imports clean throughout the project: import '{'Auth'}' from '@/modules'.

roadmap.title: The future of
roadmap.description: We are building the ultimate tool for full-stack developers, step by step.

nextjs.title: Next.js Scaffolding
nextjs.description: Complete generation of Next.js projects with TypeScript, configured Tailwind CSS and optimized folder structure.

fastapi.title: FastAPI Integration
fastapi.description: Native backend support with Python/FastAPI. Includes JWT authentication, CORS configuration and database connection.

typescript.title: TypeScript Generation
typescript.description: Automatic generation of TypeScript interfaces, types and services from your FastAPI backend. Keep your code type-safe without duplication.

future.title: What's next?
future.description: The roadmap continues to evolve. Have ideas? Share them in our GitHub repository and help us define the future of AvangCLI.

creators.title: Meet the
creators.description: This project is the result of the effort and dedication of a team of passionate developers.

cta.title: Ready to create your
cta.description: Stop setting up environments and start developing. Two commands separate you from a scalable full-stack architecture with Next.js and FastAPI.
